comments.text: The update dialog hasn't been converted to Fluent yet. Marcia, can you get a regression range using your current profile? I can't reproduce on my Nightly profile.

comments.author: amasresha@softvision.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Marcia Knous [:marcia - needinfo? me] from comment #8)
> I just checked my profile, and it appears WR is set to false.

Can you explain what you mean by "it appears WR is set to false"? Were you looking in about:config? The best way to verify is by going to about:support and checking the "Compositing" line in the Graphics section. It should say "WebRender". There should also be a WebRender section under "Decision Log" in about:support, which will provide some more detail on what caused it to be enabled/disabled.[1]

[1] https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/ce9ff94ffed34dc17ec0bfa406156d489eaa8ee1/gfx/doc/README.webrender#14-15
comments.author: jaws@mozilla.com

comments.text:

Decision log in about:support

Here is a screenshot of the decision log. I was checking the pref in about:config, but in about:support it does show Compositing | WebRender.
